Text: How Is Your Data Used and Shared?\n\nThe Data is utilized by Reklaim to create a detailed End User profile on our Platform. The more information that you provide via our “share and earn” functionality (e.g., by participating in surveys, answering questions, sharing information via social media, and similar services), the more Data collected via the Platform. The Data is sold by Reklaim to Purchasers at fair market value, and in turn, a portion of this revenue is given to you. If you’re a California consumer and want to know the categories of your Data we have sold over the past 12 months, please email us at privacy@reklaimyours.com.

Text:
Reklaim is enthusiastic about our Services and is excited to get the word out so that more End Users may use our Services to earn money for their Data. Where permitted by law, we may purchase consumer lists from third-party data brokers and engage in permission-based marketing campaigns via email, and SMS to encourage those consumers to sign up for our Services.

What Data is Collected Through the Reklaim Website(s) and how is it utilized?

When you visit our corporate Websites (e.g., www.reklaimyours.com, https://www.investors.reklaimyours.com) or related websites (collectively, “Websites” and each, a “Website”), we may collect and store information related to the use of the Websites, such as IP Address and information pertaining to devices, network, protocols and software and the date and time of visits.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: The CCPA defines personal information broadly, and as such, it includes pseudonymous identifiers such as cookie IDs and mobile advertising IDs. Under the CCPA, your request to see the personal information that we have about you may include: (1) specific pieces of personal information that we may have about you; (2) categories of personal information we have collected about you; (3) categories of sources from which the personal information is collected; (4) categories of personal information that we sold or disclosed for a business purpose about you; (5) categories of third parties to whom the personal information was sold or disclosed for a business purpose under the CCPA; and (6) the business or commercial purpose for collecting or selling personal information.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI Collected

Text: Reklaim may not be able to honor a right if doing so would violate applicable law, but we believe these rights should apply to consumers everywhere. We’ve outlined how to honor them below. California residents may also call our toll-free California consumer privacy hotline at +1 855 908 3282.

Text: Reklaim enables you to control the type of Data that we collect and how it gets shared. In some places like the State of California, Reklaim’s sharing of Data constitutes a sale.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: To opt-out of a data point from being sold or shared, you can simply log into the Platform and visit the Account page. From there, you may go to the specific data point in your Account profile and select not to share it. You may also choose to opt-out of all Data sales by Reklaim by selecting “opt-out of data sales” on the Account page or by filling out this form here. Alternatively, if you would like to stop sharing all your Data on the Platform and request that all Data associated with your Account be purged, you can delete your registered Account. Please refer to the Terms and Conditions for additional instructions on terminating your registered Account.
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text:
You can also use the tools made available via most mobile operating systems to refresh your IDFA and stop sharing your location at any point by doing the following:

Apple devices:

Opt-out of app-based tracking for interest-based advertising by updating to iOS 6.0 or higher and setting Limit Ad Tracking to ‘ON.’ For iOS 6, you can do this by selecting Settings -> General -> About -> Advertising and toggling Limit Ad Tracking to ‘ON.’ You can do this for iOS 7 and higher by selecting Settings -> Privacy -> Advertising and toggling Limit Ad Tracking to ‘ON’.

Android devices:

Opt-out app-based tracking for interest-based advertising by taking the following steps: (i) Open the Google Settings app on your device; (ii) Select “Ads”; and (iii) Opt-out of interest-based ads. You can obtain further information about how identifiers on mobile are used for advertising and receive instruction on how to opt-out of mobile advertising here: Google Privacy & Terms webpage.

A trade association called the Network Advertising Initiative also publishes a helpful list of ways to opt-out of targeted ads on mobile devices at https://www.networkadvertising.org/mobile-choice/.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: ONWARD TRANSFER\nIn addition to sharing data with Purchasers as described above, Reklaim shares information with trusted third-party vendors who may help us to manage the Websites and our Platform (e.g.,  cloud hosting services, email, and SMS messaging companies)
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
Reklaim also contracts with trusted third-party vendors to collect and receive data on our behalf for use on the Platform. 

Reklaim may be required to disclose your information to third parties when obligated to do so by law and in order to investigate, prevent, or take action regarding suspected or actual prohibited activities, including transfer, reasonably intended to meet national security or law enforcement requirements, or when we believe in good faith that disclosure is necessary to protect our rights, including but not limited to fraud and situations involving potential threats to the physical safety of any person.

Finally, Reklaim may transfer information, including any Data we have on the Platform, to a successor entity in connection with a corporate merger, consolidation, sale of assets, bankruptcy, or other corporate change.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: How Is Your Data Collected via the Reklaim Platform?\n\nReklaim collects Data directly from you and other End Users via the Platform.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: You are able to control the type of Data that we collect.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: As an End User, Reklaim puts you in control – the more information that you provide via our “share and earn” functionality (e.g., by participating in surveys, answering questions, sharing information via social media, etc.), the more data points collected via the Platform.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: The Data is sold by Reklaim to Purchasers at fair market value, and in turn, a portion of this revenue is given to you.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: We enable third-party partners to collect some data via the Reklaim websites and apps, including but not limited to Amplitude, Google Analytics, and Branch.io. This data is used to better understand Reklaim's Website and app traffic to improve the overall product.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: We enable third-party partners to collect some data via the Reklaim websites and apps, including but not limited to Amplitude, Google Analytics, and Branch.io. This data is used to better understand Reklaim's Website and app traffic to improve the overall product. In some jurisdictions, their data collection may constitute a sale
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: Some of these companies may collect pseudonymous data on the Websites and mobile apps to serve targeted ads on other websites – a practice sometimes referred to as interest-based advertising.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Some of these companies may collect pseudonymous data on the Websites and mobile apps to serve targeted ads on other websites – a practice sometimes referred to as interest-based advertising.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: The California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) provides additional privacy protections for California consumers, including a) the right to see what personal information we have about you, your computer or device (i.e., the right to know)
Label: Description of Right to Know PI sold / shared

Text: If you do not have a Reklaim Account but think we may have some personal information about you and want to better understand your rights, please email us at privacy@reklaimyours.com. California residents may also call our toll-free California consumer privacy hotline at +1 855 908 3282.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: CHANGES TO THE PRIVACY POLICY\nWe reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make changes to the Policy, we will notify you by revising the “Last Updated” date at the top of the Policy. The most current version of this Privacy Policy will govern our current use of your information and your use of our Services, the Websites and/or the app and is located here. We encourage you to review our Privacy Policy regularly to stay informed about our privacy practices.
Label: Updated Privacy Policy
